Presence of unusual or unexpected proces.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 5156
Presence of unusual or unexpected proces.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations. Cross-reference process names and paths against a baseline of known/allowed processes. Identify processes that have no prior history of network activity based on other available logs. Use correlation analysis to identify periods when unusual processes are created and network activity occurs.

Changes to host Bluetooth adapter settin.Data: Windows Event IDs related to device/driver changes
Changes to host Bluetooth adapter settin.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs related to device/driver changes (e.g., Plug and Play events, driver installations) in System or Setup logs. Look for events indicating the installation or modification of Bluetooth adapters or related drivers. Use time series analysis to identify spikes in adapter-related events across multiple hosts.
